text:
Dr Irene took care of my root canal and Dr Tan on the crown.

I neglected my tooth many years back due to some very bad experience with dentist who was quite rude.

My colleague recommended Dr Irene and she was meticulous and ever so kind in explaining each step. The root canal was undertaken with care and discovery of new crack etc was duly informed and handled.

Dr Tan for the crown was a perfectionist to ensure fit and comfort. He never rush through the procedure and took time to explain and effort to ensure the crown made was optimal.

Sincere thanks and kudos to both of them. Both procedures were almost  painless. Well I am a fan now.

Dr Ho kok sen is very detailed and experienced with amazing skills and I woke up the next day with zero pain after my dental implant. My heart felt thanks to Dr Steven Soo too. Highly recommend,  thank you.

Great and pleasant experience. I would like to commend Dr. Tan Kian Meng on his approach which gave me assurance on my visit. He is patient, understanding and gives detailed explanation on all aspects of the visit. Would definitely choose him as my dentist again for future visits.

First saw Dr Ho in 2010 for teeth implant + bone grafting and I was grateful for his skilful expertise as my situation was complicated and was told I couldn‚Äôt even do implants by other dentists prior visiting Dr Ho.
More than a decade later, my implants are still doing very well! üôèüèª

Routine dental cleaning here is not cheap but it‚Äôs a price I‚Äôd gladly pay for trustworthy and reliable dental advice and treatments.

I still having pains after two months of dental implant, I started feeling scared after reading n hearing from others, I Decided to see Dr Ho KS n he carefully examined the pain n could due to my age need a longer healing time. I was very much relieved after seeing him that the implant was ok, thank u Dr Ho n I will come back to u again.
